<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crane Flutter](/Feats.aspx?ID=6000) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 8), [Wild Mimic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=226) (Level 8), [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Crane Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5976)

**Trigger**
You are targeted with an attack by an observed attacker.

**Requirements**
You are in Crane Stance.

</column>

---

You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent. Your circumstance bonus to AC from Crane Stance increases to +3 against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you and the attacker is within your reach, you can immediately make a crane wing Strike against the attacker at a –2 penalty.
name: Crane Flutter
